title: About Hostel in PES RR Campus
content: Is PESU Hostel strict? Do the wardens frequently come and check the room? Are we allowed to go out of the hostel/campus atleast during weekends? What is the curfew timing? Are there restrictions on the WiFi? How are the facilities in the hostel? Are the rooms/bathrooms well maintained? Is the mess food any good? How are the laundry facilities? Someone please help.

comments.body: The Warden does come once or twice a month to check rooms. Yes, we are allowed to go out of the campus, but one has to return before 9 pm. WiFi restrictions are there (the worst) & sometimes there's just no point in using PESU wifi because of these restrictions. The rooms/bathrooms are well maintained in NB, NBX, and MM blocks. The mess food is good for vegetarians in Namdhari mess but for rest, it's just ok. Laundry facilities are good but do avoid giving your expensive ones as they do get misplaced sometimes.
I heard someone say that the authorities kind of force/pressurize seniors to vacate out of hostel to make room for juniors? Is there any truth to this?
apart from curfew timings i have heard they are pretty chill, and obv wifi is worth jackshit, apart from that mess and all, its fine

Nah not true. On the contrary, seniors get more priority in hostel admittance.  
Also, curfew timing is 10 pm now, so you can stay out of hostel till 10.
If you find some good VPN then wifi restrictions will not be an issue, For me proton vpn on laptop and 1.1.1.1 on mobile works just fine.
